GSP28prakp08u:34: yato“ghaṭamahaṃ budhye” iti buddherboddhāro766 bhinnamātmānaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP28prakp08u:50: sā ca svayamprakāśā kāryakāraṇabhāvenānādisantānavāhinī svāpa-mada-mūrcchādiṣvabhibhūtatayā punaḥ punaranusandhānapathaṃ 771nā'yāti /
GSP28prakp08u:89: na punarmitho 'pi bhūtāni na saṃyujyanta itayācakṣmahe /
GSP28prakp08u:127: anyathā saurībhirbhāmiranugṛhītaṃ cakṣussphuṭataraṃ vyomni nīlimānaṃ prakāśayet /
GSP28prakp08u:162: nanu bhūbhāgādereva chāyātve kathaṃ dravyāntareṇa 799vyapadeśaḥ“asya chāyeyami“ti /
GSP28prakp08u:167: yo 'pi ca śāstrakārāṇāṃ vyavahāraḥ 802“chatragṛhādīnāṃ tulyaṃ cchāyālakṣaṇaṃ kāryami“ti sa ālokāpavāraṇābhiprāyeṇa varṇanīyaḥ /
GSP28prakp08u:174: yacca visphāritākṣaḥ kūpādiṣu jalamadhyastha suṣiramadhyakṣamīkṣata ityucyate,
GSP28prakp08u:182: pṛthagdravyatayā te tu na guṇāḥ kasyacinmatāḥ” //
GSP28prakp08u:203: na ca guṇabhūtasya śabdasya saṃyogalakṣaṇā prāptirupapadyata iti /
GSP28prakp08u:220: kiñca gandhasya pārthivadravyasamavetasyaikākino gandhāntarārambhakatvānupapatteragandhaṃ śarīraṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp08u:226: kāryadravye ca viśeṣaguṇaḥ kāraṇaguṇapūrvaka eva, rūpādivat /
GSP28prakp08u:231: yathā--- 821madaśaktiḥ pārthiveṣu paramāṇuṣvasatyapi tadārabdhe kāryadravye surākhye niṣpadyate,
GSP28prakp08u:235: śaktyākhyo hi hi guṇaḥ sarvadravyeṣu tattatkāryaviṣayaḥ kāryasamadhigamyo 'bhyupagamyate /
GSP28prakp08u:238: api ca dravyāntarasaṃyogādakāryabhūteṣu pārthivaparamāṇuṣvakāraṇaguṇapūrvako 'pi madaśaktyākhyo guṇo nānupapannaḥ /
GSP28prakp08u:247: nirguṇatayā ca saṃyogavibhāgau prati nirapekṣakāraṇatvābhāvena guṇatvasiddheḥ /
GSP28prakp08u:254: “ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmī“ti 828jñāturahaṅkārāspadībhūtatvāt“ahaṃ gacchāmyahaṃ sthūlaḥ” ityādāvahvaṅkārasya śarīra eva pravṛttyavivādāccharīrameva pratyakṣaṃ jñātṛ pratīyate,
GSP28prakp08u:259: nanu śarīrasya caitanye mṛtaśarīre 'pi tat syāt / na /
GSP28prakp08u:263: nanu mamedaṃ śarīramiti dehātirikte 'hvaṅkāro niviśate / na /
GSP28prakp08u:270: śarīravikārahetutvācca teṣāṃ sutarāṃ śarīraguṇatvam1 833na hyatadguṇastaṃ guṇinaṃ vikartumutsahate //
GSP28prakp08u:272: sukhādiṣūtpanneṣu tatra śarīre vikārye vikāraṃ prati samavāyikāraṇabhūte,
GSP28prakp08u:274: na ca śakyaṃ vaktuṃ sukhādimadātmasaṃyoga eva śarīrasamaveteṣu vikāreṣvasamavāyikāraṇamastviti,
GSP28prakp08u:286: “ahaṃ gacchāmī“ti pratipattisamaye 'pi pratipattā śarīrātiriktaḥ 838pratipattṛsvabhāvo gantāraṃ dehaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ pratīyata eva /
GSP28prakp08u:315: sadā sannihitakāraṇakaṃ hi kāryaṃ na kādācitkaṃ bhavet /
GSP28prakp08u:362: yadyapi śaṃyvadhikaraṇa mī. da. 3.4.10. siddhāntaparyālocanayā niṣiddhādapi kutaścitpratyavāyodayaḥ,
GSP28prakp08u:406: iti pañcasu vidhāsu sarvaṃ tattvaṃ parisamāpyate /
GSP28prakp08u:419: anye manyante---svaprakāśāya hi pramāṇamaprakāśasvabhāveṣu viṣayeṣva pekṣyate,
GSP28prakp08u:424: anyathotpannāyāmapi tasyāmaprakāśamānāyāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ viditatvāvedane viditatvavyavahāro na syāt,
GSP28prakp08u:425: na ca vācyaṃ vyavahārayogyataiva viṣayeṣu puruṣasya saṃvit,
GSP28prakp08u:431: viṣayeṣu hi sthāyiṣu svayamprakāśeṣvabhyupagamyamāneṣu svāpādidaśāḥ puruṣāṇāmanupapannāssyuḥ /
GSP28prakp08u:432: saṃvidi tu svayamprakāśāyāṃ naiṣa doṣa āpadyate,
GSP28prakp08u:434: viṣayāstu pratyabhijñābalalabdhasthemānaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ svāpādidaśāyāmapi na santīti na śakyamabhidhātum /
GSP28prakp08u:446: 872yatvidaṃ kenacitpralapyate-svārasikamapi pārthivānāmaṇūnāṃ śyāmatvaṃ pākapadāvedanīyenāgnisaṃyogena nivartata iti /
GSP28prakp08u:450: svārasikatā ca pārthivānāmaṇūnāṃ śyāmatayā na siddhā,
GSP28prakp08u:457: na ca viṣayā boddharyanavabhāmāne bhāsanta iti tāvat siddham /
GSP28prakp08u:468: evañca viṣayavittigocaratbādātmano viṣayavedanopāyoparamāt877 svāpādiṣvaprakāśo yukta eva878 /
GSP28prakp08u:488: śarīropaghāti hi duḥkhodayāttadupaghātaparihāraṃ sarve prārthayanta ityātmani premābhimānaḥ /
GSP28prakp08u:489: kiñca saṃsāriṇāṃ svārasikaḥ paramānando nānubhūtapūrva iti,
GSP28prakp08u:505: na khalvadvaitaṃ kasya cit pramāṇasya gocaraḥ /
GSP28prakp08u:521: ekasya dverūpyavirodhāt sāmānyaviśeṣau tu parasparasambaddhe dve vastunī pratyakṣamavagāhate,
GSP28prakp08u:531: athedamucyate“sa eṣa ādeśo neti netī” bṛ. u. a. 3. brā. maṃ. 6.ṭati 901sakalopādhiniṣedhena nānābhūtavastvantarāpākaraṇādadvaitamāgamena sādhyata iti /
GSP28prakp08u:533: yaḥ khalveṣa iti sadrūpatayā pratyavamṛṣṭaḥ padārthaḥ,
GSP28prakp08u:542: 906tathā ca so 'yamātmīya eva bāṇo bhavantaṃ praharati---“907labdharūpe kvacitkiñcittādṛgeva niṣidhyate /
GSP28prakp08u:563: 919“ātmani vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatī” bṛ. u. 4a. mai. brā. ti yaducyate,
GSP28prakp08u:565: tasmin vijñāte sarvameva jñānaṃ niṣphalamiti darśayitumityeṣā dik /
GSP28prakp08u:573: evaṃ hi nānābhūtānāmākārāṇāṃ prakāśābhede prakāśasyāpi nānābhāvāpatteradvaitaṃ dūramapāstam /
GSP28prakp08u:577: tena sahāsadātmāna ākārāstāvadabhinnā iti na ghaṭate /
GSP28prakp08u:580: ata eṣo 'pi māhāyānikapakṣānupraveśāt925 brahmavādināṃ moha eva /
GSP28prakp08u:588: dharmādharmavaśīkṛto hi jīvastāsu tāsu yoniṣu saṃsarati /
GSP28prakp08u:594: ucyate---yaḥ khalu sāṃsārikebhyo duḥkhebhya udvignaḥ tadanuṣaṅgaśabalebhyaśca sukhebhyo 'pi vigataspṛho mokṣāyottiṣṭhate,
GSP28prakp08u:596: kāmyebhyo 'bhyudayasādhanebhyaśca nivartamānassannutpannapūrvau dharmādharmau bhogena kṣayaṃ nayan,
GSP28prakp08u:597: śama-dama-brahma-caryādikāṅgopabṛṃhitenā'tmajñānena932 “na sa punarāvartate” chā. u. a. 8 ityapunarāvṛttaye coditena niśśeṣakarmāśayaṃ nāśayanam mucyate /
GSP28prakp08u:614: tatra tatra tāvadātma vartata iti pramāṇasiddham /
GSP28prakp08u:627: sa ca saṃyogo 936dviṣṭhatayā mano937-viraheṇānyatra na vartate /
GSP28prakp08u:634: ātmanastu sato 'pi sakalakaraṇapathātītasya darśanaprasaktirāpādayitumaśakyetyagatyā sarvasayogibhirātmā saṃyujyate /
GSP28prakp08u:670: na ca paraśarīraceṣṭānuguṇaḥ prayatnassvātmani puruṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣībhavatīti,
GSP28prakp08u:673: kathamidamucyate“agṛhyo na hi gṛhyate” bṛ. u. a. 4. brā. 2 kha. 4 iti /
GSP28prakp08u:674: pareṇa na gṛhyata ityetadabhiprāyametadbhavatītyucyategrāhakaikarasatayā pareṇa na gṛhyata iti tasyār'thaḥ,
GSP28prakp08u:684: na ca vedanā pādādiṣveva samavaitītiśakyate vaktum,
GSP28prakp08u:695: śūlastu vāyuvā saheti vātapitta---śleṣmaṇāṃ kṣobhajeṣu sarveṣu vikāreṣu veditavyam /
GSP28prakp08u:711: iti mahāmahopādhyāyaśrīśālikanāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ tattvāloko nāmāṣṭamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam /
